title: Why David brought his own utensils

content.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a reason why David brought his own utensils to lunch?

choices.label: David does not know how to use chopsticks very well.
Restaurants in China might not provide knives and forks.
Using one’s own utensils is more sanitary.

content.answer: Using one’s own utensils is more sanitary.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
